verses.verse: A diligent and grateful heart Prompts me to sing Thy praise. Thy love and mercies from the start Have blessed me all my days.
I thank Thee for the means to serve With talents and with tithes, For sharing brings the utmost joy When lifting other lives.
My thanks I give for stewardship To minister through deeds, To serve and share with patient care Thy people in their needs.
O Lord, I dedicate my all In this response to Thee. Help me to magnify this call In deep humility.
